html: (2 Nephi 8:24)."There shall no more come into thee the uncircumcised and the unclean." Circumcision was a token of the covenant people of Israel. Isaiah uses this description to emphasize that in the day when the earth is cleansed of the ungodly, none but the covenant people of Christ will enter into holy places. (See Joel 3:17; Zechariah 14:20-21.)
